00003 TetraRendering::TetraRendering() : Rendering("tetrabot", Ogre::ST_EXTERIOR_CLOSE) {

00009 bool TetraRendering::mousePressed(const OIS::MouseEvent &evt, const OIS::MouseButtonID id) {
00010 
00011         if(id == OIS::MB_Left) {
00012                 std::cout << "MOUSE LEFT pressed" << std::endl;
00013                 this->leftMousePressed = true; //for drap and drop with mouseMoved
00014         } else if (id == OIS::MB_Right) {
00015                 CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().hide();
00016                 this->rightMousePressed = true; //for move camera
00017         }
00018 
00019         return Rendering::mousePressed(evt, id);
00020 }
00021 
00022 bool TetraRendering::mouseReleased(const OIS::MouseEvent &evt, const OIS::MouseButtonID id) {
00023 
00024         if(id == OIS::MB_Left) {
00025                 this->leftMousePressed = false;
00026 
00027         } else if (id == OIS::MB_Right) {
00028                 CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().show();
00029                 this->rightMousePressed = false;
00030         }
00031 
00032         return Rendering::mouseReleased(evt, id);
00033 }

00035 bool TetraRendering::mouseMoved (const OIS::MouseEvent &evt) {
00036 
00037         std::cout << "Mouse moved" << std::endl;
00038 
00039         if(this->leftMousePressed) {
00040 
00041                 Ogre::Ray mouseRay;
00042                 //Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult queryResult;
00043                 Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult::iterator itr;
00044 
00045                 //CEGUI::Point mousePos = CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().getPosition();
00046                 //mouseRay = this->pCamera->getCameraToViewportRay(mousePos.d_x/float(evt.state.width), mousePos.d_y/float(evt.state.height));
00047                 mouseRay = this->pCamera->getCameraToViewportRay(evt.state.X.abs/float(evt.state.width), evt.state.Y.abs/float(evt.state.height));
00048                 //std::cout << "X:" << evt.state.X.abs/float(evt.state.width) << std::endl;
00049                 //std::cout << "Y:" << evt.state.Y.abs/float(evt.state.height) << std::endl;
00050                 this->pRaySceneQuery = this->pSceneManager->createRayQuery(mouseRay);
00051                 this->pRaySceneQuery->setQueryTypeMask(Ogre::SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION);
00052                 this->pRaySceneQuery->setSortByDistance(true);
00053 
00054                 Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult & queryResult = this->pRaySceneQuery->execute() ;
00055 
00056                 if(queryResult.size() > 0) {
00057                         std::cout << "Ray positive result" << std::endl;
00058                         //Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult & queryResult = this->pRaySceneQuery->getLastResults();
00059 
00060                         itr = queryResult.begin();
00061 
00062                         if (itr != queryResult.end() && itr->worldFragment) {
00063                                 std::cout << "Target ADD" << std::endl;
00064                                 this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->setPosition(itr->worldFragment->singleIntersection);
00065                                 this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->setVisible(true,true);
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068 
00069         } else if(this->rightMousePressed) {
00070                 std::cout << "right mouse pressed" << std::endl;
00071 
00072                 //move camera around the robot.
00073                 this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCamera")->translate(0.0,evt.state.Y.rel*this->deltaT*400,evt.state.X.rel*this->deltaT*400);
00074                 //this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCamera")->yaw(Ogre::Degree(-evt.state.X.rel*10),Ogre::Node::TS_PARENT);
00075                 //this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCamera")->pitch(Ogre::Degree(-evt.state.Y.rel*10),Ogre::Node::TS_PARENT);
00076                 //this->pCamera->lookAt(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->getPosition());
00077         }
00078         return Rendering::mouseMoved(evt);
00079 }

00204 TetraRendering::~TetraRendering() {

00210 void TetraRendering::createScene() {
00211 
00212         Ogre::Entity *pEntity;
00213         Ogre::Light *pLight;
00214 
00215         pEntity = this->pSceneManager->createEntity("Sphere1", "Sphere.mesh");
00216         pEntity->setCastShadows(true);
00217 
00218         //create environement
00219         this->initGround("Ground.mesh", false, GROUND_SCALE);
00220         this->initSkyBox(true, "Etoiles");
00221 
00222         //sceneNode for nodes of robot.
00223         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeNoeud1");
00224         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1")->attachObject(pEntity);
00225         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1")->scale(NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS);
00226         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 100, 0));
00227 
00228         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeNoeud2");
00229         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2")->attachObject(pEntity->clone("Sphere2"));
00230         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2")->scale(NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS);
00231         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(50, 100, 0));
00232 
00233         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeNoeud3");
00234         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3")->attachObject(pEntity->clone("Sphere3"));
00235         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3")->scale(NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS);
00236         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 100, 50));
00237 
00238         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeNoeud4");
00239         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4")->attachObject(pEntity->clone("Sphere4"));
00240         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4")->scale(NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS, NODE_RADIUS);
00241         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(50, 100, 50));
00242 
00243         //init physic
00244         Vector3Gen *worldMin = new Vector3Gen(-1000,-1000,-1000);
00245         Vector3Gen* worldMax= new Vector3Gen(1000,1000,1000);
00246         Vector3Gen *gravite = new Vector3Gen(0,-9.8,0.);
00247         WorldInfo infos = WorldInfo(worldMin,worldMax,gravite);
00248         this->physicWorld = new PhysicWorld(infos);
00249 
00250         this->physicWorld->initGround("./data/terrains/Ground.obj");
00251 
00252         this->robot = new RobotTetra(this->physicWorld->m_dynamicsWorld,this->pSceneManager,btVector3(0,30,0));
00253 
00254         //init pistonRendering.
00255         for (int i=0 ; i<EDGE_NUMBER ; i++ ) {
00256                 this->pistons.push_back(new PistonRendering(EDGE_MIN_SIZE, EDGE_MAX_SIZE, this->pSceneManager, i));
00257         }
00258 
00259         //init sceneNode for CenterOfMass of robot.
00260         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeCenterOfMass");
00261         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->setPosition(Vector3Gen(this->robot->getCenterOfMassPosition()).toVector3());
00262         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->setVisible(false,true);
00263 
00264         //init sceneNode for camera 3rd.
00265         this->pCamera->setAutoTracking(true, this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")) ;
00266         //this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->createChild("NodeCamera");
00267         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeCamera");
00268         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCamera")->attachObject(this->pCamera);
00269         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCamera")->setPosition(50, 50, -50);
00270         //this->pCamera->lookAt(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->getPosition());
00271         //light
00272         pLight = this->pSceneManager->createLight("Light");
00273         pLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00274         //pLight->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 400, 0));
00275         pLight->setDiffuseColour(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
00276         pLight->setSpecularColour(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
00277 
00278         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->createChild("NodeLight");
00279         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeLight")->attachObject(pLight);
00280         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeLight")->setPosition(0, 200, 0);
00281 
00282         //init sceneNode for target.
00283         this->pSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChild("NodeTarget");
00284         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->attachObject(pEntity->clone("Target"));
00285         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->scale(1, 1, 1);
00286         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(500, 0, -500));
00287         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeTarget")->setVisible(false,true);
00288 
00289 }

00291 const Ogre::SceneManager * TetraRendering::getSceneManager(void) const {
00292         return(this->pSceneManager);
00293 }
00294 
00295 bool TetraRendering::frameStarted(const Ogre::FrameEvent & evt)
00296 {
00297         //update physic calcul.
00298         if(this->physicWorld != NULL) {
00299                 this->physicWorld->m_dynamicsWorld->stepSimulation(this->deltaT, 10);
00300         }
00301 
00302         //update position center of Mass.
00303         this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeCenterOfMass")->setPosition(Vector3Gen(this->robot->getCenterOfMassPosition()).toVector3());
00304 
00305         //update piston.
00306         this->pistons[0]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2"));
00307         this->pistons[1]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3"));
00308         this->pistons[2]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud1"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4"));
00309         this->pistons[3]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3"));
00310         this->pistons[4]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud2"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4"));
00311         this->pistons[5]->afficherPiston(this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud3"),this->pSceneManager->getSceneNode("NodeNoeud4"));
00312 
00313         return Rendering::frameStarted(evt);
00314 }
